items.title: SAMHI Hotels: Why is this hotel stock poised for re-rating?
items.description: After the strengthening of the balance sheet as well as the turnaround in operations post the Initial Public offer (IPO) in September 2023, SAMHI is now set to add/renovate inventory to boost growth.

items.title: Tata Sons' move to boost stake in Tata Play gets CCI clearance
items.description: Tata Play and Airtel Digital TV accounted for more than 35 million paid subscribers as of September last year, representing more than half of India's 60 million DTH subscriber base, according to a government report.

items.title: PepsiCo to acquire soda brand Poppi for $1.95 billion
items.description: PepsiCo is working to diversify away from its standard soda and snacks by making acquisitions of healthier brands.

items.title: New seats, modern cabins: Air India showcases first retrofit aircraft as $400-mn upgradation bet takes off
items.description: According to Air India CEO and MD, Air India will be retrofitting more than 100 aircraft and has also ordered around 25,000 seats as part of retrofitting the planes.

items.title: Each of the four demerged Vedanta entities can be a $100 billion company, says Anil Agarwal
items.description: The ongoing demerger proposes to create natural resource entities which will further result in creation of downstream industries and more jobs, said Vedanta's Anil Agarwal, adding that the demand for critical minerals and transition metals 'continues to grow at a double-digit rate'.

items.title: HC discharges Gautam Adani, Rajesh Adani in market regulations 'violation' case
items.description: The HC's single bench of Justice R N Laddha on Monday quashed the sessions court order and discharged the duo and the company from the case

items.title: Religare Enterprises commissions governance review, seeks funds from the Burman Group
items.description: Religare Enterprises has decided to review the past operating practices, and is appointing legal advisors to seek improvements around systems, and to identify any potential instances of misconduct by 'certain current and/or ex-employees'.

items.title: NPCIL to add 1,400 MW nuclear power capacity this year, says CMD Bhuwan Chandra Pathak
items.description: On March 17, NPCIL commissioned a 700 MW indigenous pressurised heavy water reactor, RAPP-7, at the Rajasthan Atomic Power Project (RAPP), taking India’s nuclear capacity to 8,880 MW. It expects to get RAPP-8 operational by year-end

items.title: Tata Motors to increase price of commercial vehicles by up to 2% from April
items.description: The price increase is to offset the rise in input costs, and will vary as per individual model and variant, Tata Motors said in a regulatory filing
